results.title: Indonesia builds a better life
results.brief_description: Indonesia, since gaining independence, has begun a series of new developments. Thousands of men and women are being taught to read and write as part of a campaign to eradicate illiteracy. An attempt is being made to control the spread of the disease Framboesia, commonly known as yaws. Those already suffering from the disease are given on the spot treatment. While this medical attention is being given research workers are constantly checking its results, and reporting to the World Health Organisation.

results.title: Indo-Australia cricket tests, 1964
results.brief_description: A survey of the tour of India by the Australian Test Team in 1964. Shows highlights of the matches played in various cities and the personalities associated with the tour. A very successful series of matches which drew large and enthusiastic crowds.

results.title: Individualised instruction
results.creator_credit: University of New South Wales. Tertiary Education Research Centre, University of New South Wales and George Pashuk
results.brief_description: Considers the use of tape-slide combinations as a strategy for teaching large undergraduate classes. Two methods of utilisation are discussed. Considers underlying principles such as feedback and student participation, the practicalities of cost and program construction, and attempts to evaluate the advantages and disadvantages of this medium.

results.title: Individual Skills Volleyball
results.brief_description: Key individual offensive skills are necessary to play effective Power Volleyball, Serve, serve reception, set and the attack are examined with practical examples in this program.

results.title: Individual Offensive Skills Volleyball
results.brief_description: This video shows all the offensive skills of volleyball using slow motion replays to clarify every move. A very clear and concise video which should be of help to all volleyball players.

results.title: Indirect inguinal hernia surgical anatomy
results.brief_description: A medical film, dealing with the causes, diagnosis, and treatment of indirect inguinal hernia. Suitable for screening only to members and students of the medical and nursing professions.

results.title: Indigenous Australians : an Aboriginal community focus
results.brief_description: An interactive CDROM from NSW TAFE which is the first to draw on the comprehensive knowledge and expertise of Aboriginal community members and is an invaluable teaching resource. The concept behind the CD ROM is to let members of various Aboriginal communities become teachers of their rich culture. A resource guide accompanies the CD ROM.

results.title: Indigeneous Australians: an Aboriginal community focus (A)
results.creator_credit: New South Wales. Technical and Further Education and Monitor Interactive
results.brief_description: An interactive CD-ROM from TAFE which is the first to draw on the comprehensive knowledge and expertise of Aboriginal community members and is an invaluable teaching resource. The concept behind this CD-ROM is to let members of various Aboriginal Communities become teachers of their rich culture. A resource guide accompanies the CD-ROM. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: This CD-ROM is compatible on both Macintosh and IBM compatible PC’s.
